shortMSG:
You are in the courtyard. 
 There is a main gate that you can use to escape from the mansion.
 You may go check other areas through a garden gate at north west side, a garage door or a front door at north side of the courtyard.
longMSG:
You are in the courtyard. 
 Features: main gate 
  Areas you may go to: 
    northwest - garden gate to garden - 1st floor
    north - front door to living room - 1st floor
    northeast - garage door to garage - 1st floor
